body_html: Could not even run the basic example after installing Tensorflow 1.10.0 with pip install command. Thanks to the suggestion here -- Installing the Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable Update 3 (x64 version) -- problem was fixed and able to work with Tensorflow with Spark now.
